job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description: Five9 is a leading provider of cloud software for the enterprise contact center market bringing the power of the cloud to thousands of customers and facilitating more than three billion customer interactions annually Since 2001 Five9 has led the cloud revolution in contact centers helping organizations transition from legacy premisebased solutions to the cloud Five9 provides businesses with cloud contact center software that is reliable secure compliant and scalable which is designed to create exceptional customer experiences increase agent productivity and deliver tangible business resultsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtThe roleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYou will be developing a Single Page Application and the required backend services using JavaScript C Nodejs and Java technologies for our core Call Center products Our SaaS team develops VOIP voice over IP Chat Email Predictive Dialing Agent Desktop Predictive and Progressive Dialing with an enormous data channel and Artificial Intelligence If you love having big goals real world challenges and making customers incredibly happy whilst fostering your obsessive need for perfect code and user experience this is the job for youltbrgtltbrgtAlong with coding you will be responsible for working with product managers other developers and designers on our agile team structure We love product engineers who lead the charge communicating with customers and delivering the most innovative intuitive application possible is a mustltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtRequired Skills ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtMust have a Bachelors Degree or Masters Degree preference given to Computer Science Engineering and STEM majors  and suitable industry coding or opensource experience is welcome tooltligtltligt02 years experienceltligtltligtExcellent problem solverltligtltligtPassionate about coding and customersltligtltligtStrong Computer Science fundamentals Logic OOP Events data structures etcltligtltligtClasses to one or more of the following Java Javascript CltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtAppreciated Skillsltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years of professional or opensource experience writing JavaScript not just jQueryltligtltligt2 years of professional or opensource experience writing RESTful APIs and middle tier coding in Nodejs Java Python or CltligtltligtAgile coding experience working in small teams that have made a big impact fastltligtltligtFamiliarity with standard javascript async patterns events closures callbacks promises error handling etcltligtltligtNever ending desire to selfeducate on the latest list of web technologies like HTML CSS javascript frameworks and bleeding edge browser featuresidiosyncrasiesltligtltligtSimilar experience in a modern consumer environment Pinterest Box Quora Facebook andor open source projects contributed to nodejs dojo toolkit NPM modules etcltligtltligtExperience with GIT SCMltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtFive9 embraces diversity and is committed to building a team that represents a variety of backgrounds perspectives and skills  The more inclusive we are the better we are  Five9 is an equal opportunity employerltbrgtltbrgtOur headquarters are located in the beautiful Bishop Ranch Business Park in San Ramon CA
